DOC.brief_summary: Gestational diabetes traditionally treat insulin . Metformin peroral drug use worldwide treatment type 2 diabetes also study patient gestational diabetes . The investigator aim compare insulin metformin treatment gestational diabetes . The investigator hypothesis difference insulin metformin treat mother main outcome criterion ( birth weight , neonatal complication ) .
DOC.detailed_description: Gestational diabetes traditionally treat insulin . Metformin peroral drug use worldwide treatment type 2 diabetes also study patient gestational diabetes . The investigator aim compare insulin metformin treatment gestational diabetes . The investigator hypothesis difference insulin metformin treat mother main outcome criterion ( birth weight , neonatal complication ) . The study perform randomize control trial one center , Turku University hospital use non-inferiority design June 2006 - December 2010 . The final study population consist altogether 217 woman , 110 receive metformin 107 insulin .
DOC.criteria: Mothers gestational diabetes least twice plasma glucose fast > 5.4 mmol/L and/or 1 hour postprandial value > 7.7 mmol/L 24 32 gestational week 1 . Fasting glucose > 7.0 mmol/L 1 hour postprandial plasma glucose > 11.0 mmol/L Glycosylated hemoglobin A1c ( HbA1c ) > 7.0 % 2 . Renal , hepatic cardiac failure 3 . Pregestational use metformin 4 . Pregnancy multiple fetus
